availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jacob E. Lett (Kenton County, Kentucky, master carpenter.)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, master carpenter. Kentucky native. Married to Catherine Wade Lett. Father of William E. Lett, Richard Lett, John Lett, and Kate Lett. Carpenter in Kenton County in 1850. Master carpenter in Kenton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington , p. 274B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 3, p. 634.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 3, p. 24A.
U.S. City Directories, 1822-1995 "Covington, Kentucky, City Directory, 1878" p. 293.
